Description: Hello and thanks for checking out another great auction from HRPawn! We hope you enjoy the photos and information presented herein. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us for a prompt and friendly response. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ESP LTD MFA-600 Matt Devries Signature Series Black Satin Electric Guitar Up for sale we have an ESP LTD Electric Guitar in Excellent Working Condition. The Guitar was very well taken care of with only normal minor signs of use & wear. Overall it is considered in Excellent Cosmetic Condition. This Electric Bass Guitar is a real cool, smooth guitar. All electronics have been inspected/tested and considered in Fully Functional Order. Listing includes electric Electric Guitar in a ESP Gig Bag. 30-day return for your peace of mind. Rest assured, we are not happy until we know you are completely thrilled with your purchase. We are doing all we can to not misrepresent anything. Any questions just ask, any comments please share, and thanks for checking out our listings! Product Description The LTD MFA-600 Matt Devries Electric Guitar features a solid alder body with a maple set-thru neck. The set-thru neck joint reaches deep into the body wood to maximize contact, assuring a tremendous amount of string vibration transfers throughout the entire electric guitar. Those vibrations are sent to your amp by a single, beefy active EMG-81 pickup at the bridge position. To keep your signal clean and mean, ESP has limited the controls to a single volume knob. The MFA-600 neck features a fast U-shaped profile and an ebony fingerboard with 24 extra jumbo frets, perfect for high-speed playing. Black nickel hardware completes the metal-ready look. Rhythm guitarist Matt Devries, along with Chimaira, have been taking the world of metal by storm since the early 00s, and show no signs of stopping.
